items.title: R1-R12 Lint Rules
items.description: Complete set of 12 production-ready linting rules for n8n workflows, covering rate limiting, error handling, secrets detection, and more.

items.title: GitHub App Integration
items.description: Full integration with GitHub Check Runs API for automated PR reviews with inline annotations.

items.title: Observability Stack
items.description: Comprehensive monitoring with Prometheus, Grafana, and Tempo for distributed tracing.

items.title: E2E Tests & Documentation
items.description: Complete end-to-end test suite, OpenAPI documentation, and distributed tracing implementation.

items.title: CLI Tool (Basic)
items.description: Command-line interface with scan command, JSON output, config file support, and CI/CD integration via exit codes.

items.title: Advanced Output Formats
items.description: SARIF (GitHub Code Scanning), JUnit XML (Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI, Azure Pipelines), and GitHub Actions output formats for CLI tool with comprehensive CI/CD integration examples.

items.title: R13: Webhook Acknowledgment Pattern
items.description: Ensure webhooks acknowledge receipt before processing to prevent timeout issues and duplicate events.

items.title: R14: Retry-After Compliance
items.description: Validate proper handling of HTTP 429 (Too Many Requests) and Retry-After headers with provider-aware retry templates.

items.title: Suppression Mechanism
items.description: Allow developers to suppress specific findings with inline comments (flowlint-disable) similar to ESLint.

items.title: R15: Two-Phase Commit Pattern
items.description: Detect and recommend two-phase commit patterns for side effects (payments, emails) to prevent duplicate operations.

items.title: R16: Schedule Concurrency Guards
items.description: Prevent concurrent execution of scheduled workflows when not intended, detecting overlapping cron jobs.

items.title: R17: Environment Drift Detection
items.description: Identify configuration differences between development, staging, and production workflows.

items.title: Provider-Aware Retry Templates
items.description: Intelligent retry configuration suggestions based on API provider rate limits (Stripe, Shopify, Notion, GitHub).

items.title: Plugin System
items.description: Extensible architecture allowing teams to write and share custom lint rules via npm packages.
